column1: Kata Robata////My wife and I went here to celebrate our anniversary
column2: and what a night.  The presentations were beautiful
column4: and the atmosphere was sexy.  The place was jam packed
column5: but we had reso's and quickly proceeded past the line to a table (hint*).  The menu is beautiful and fun to create your own tasting menu
column6: I reccomend the collar of fish on the robata with a side of the shishito peppers.  Whatever you choose
